headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data:; media-src 'self' https://xombix.com https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com blob:; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; connect-src *; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com;
